title: Tesla To Eliminate Model S & Model X To Make Robots
description:
Tesla will stop making the Model S and Model X in the second quarter of this year and begin production of Optimus robots instead.

The post Tesla To Eliminate Model S & Model X To Make Robots appeared first on CleanTechnica.
